website_summaries.verdict: A superhero serum that fights against wrinkles with collagen as its super power. Definitely a serum to choose for your skincare regimen.
pros: Collagen helps to increase skin elasticity and youthfulness
This product is rich with African birch bark extract, which helps with the production of collagen to make skin super soft
Seaweed extract is also present to make your skin smooth and flawless
Enhanced skin moisture is achieved thanks to the omega-3 fatty acids present
cons: Causes some users to break out

customer_reviews.title: Love Elemis.
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time user of of Lancome products. I recently started using Elemis and my skin is so much softer.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Moisture plus
customer_reviews.text: This product is the first that I put on my face in the AM and PM. I can immediately feel its moisture soak into my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed....
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately didn’t not work for me. Used as directed and some extra, but no Visible improvement . I’m 44 years old and was trying to tighten my fine wrinkles but results didn’t not exceeded my expectations..... Sasha
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: I love this serum
customer_reviews.text: I love this serum. I’m trying the Lift Effect right now. I hope I like it as much as I do this product
customer_reviews.author: rlb

customer_reviews.title: Works fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: First used it on at a spa in a cruise.and it instantly helped with some problem areas. I tried others hoping to save some money but this one is worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: diane coe

customer_reviews.title: Must Get!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Can not compare to other brands. My skin looks and feels fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: noelia estevez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product was suggested by my facial technician as my face is severely dehydrated, I love this serum and I’m so glad I am able to purchase it at Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Damarys Gil

customer_reviews.text: This is a different formula than what I purchased on a cruise. it has a a unpleasant odor. I won't be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Manlutac

customer_reviews.title: Effective Product
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for 2 years, very soothing and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Read

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: It goes on like silk. It makes my skin look dewy.
customer_reviews.author: Customer NY fashion

customer_reviews.title: Smells so bad!
customer_reviews.text: It smells like skunk spray! Awful for the expensive price!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: That is very good for my face and is a good product
customer_reviews.text: Have been with this brand for a long time and you don’t need a lot last long
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Cerino

customer_reviews.title: Face skin wrinkle free
customer_reviews.text: Skin look so bright wrinkle free face look 10 times younger love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amita patel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Oaks very well have used it now twice and will continue to use it
customer_reviews.author: Regina Drueding

customer_reviews.title: I’ve used this product before and loved it but it was a cream
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product before and loved it but it was a cream. What I got this time is a clear to yellowish illiquid which makes me think it’s old. It also has a different smell to it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Payne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! .+*:゚+。.☆You can see your wrinkles disappear! Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Elemis products are really good but costly
customer_reviews.text: Elemis products are really good but a little expensive for quantity. That’s why I bought two when I saw them aT a 25 percent savings on Black Friday I also really like Elemis. Collagen Night cream. Very expensive but got it on Black Friday sale also
customer_reviews.author: Barb B creations

customer_reviews.title: Great product, could be a better value.
customer_reviews.text: I think I'm stuck on Estee Lauder's Advanced Night Repair serum, but switching up my routine a little I was very pleased with this serum by Elemis. I like to apply serum right after an oil at night, and this made my skin look dewy and well-rested. I don't really like the bottle because I can't see how much is left, but I do like the pump because these skin care products are expsnive. More than once I've knocked over these stupid dropper bottle and lost some very expensive product when a pump would have saved the day. Overall this could be a better value, but it's a great product for skincare. Four stars.
customer_reviews.author: LunchWithLions

customer_reviews.title: Super Serum Is Not As Effective As Elemis Facial Oils
customer_reviews.text: I like beauty products that show immediate results, and that’s why I use Elemis facial oils. Because the oils work so well, I wondered if this anti-aging elixir worked as effectively or better. It sure is hard to tell. I love the oily consistency, and my face drinks the serum right up, but other than that, I’m just not seeing a firmer, visibly smoother or plumped complexion, and I’m almost through my first 0.5 oz. bottle. Elemis products are too expensive to wonder if they’re working. I’ll stick with the facial oils (pro-collagen, superfood or pro-definition)—they give immediate results and do a very effective job regenerating, smoothing and nourishing my mature skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyfingers

customer_reviews.title: Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid Oil
customer_reviews.text: The ingredient I recognize as a wrinkle reducer is Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid. The serum is basically an oil and the pump helps to dispense a small amount and not end up with a greasy mess. The bottle and presentation is very nice, at this price point I expect this. The bottle contains .5oz of the serum. I did not have any breakouts or issues from using the serum.
customer_reviews.author: My Old KY Home

customer_reviews.title: Not for me..
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I don't have the right skin type for this serum but it didn't really work for me. I found it to be too oily with a consistency similar to baby oil. The scent is also stronger than I anticipated and not especially pleasant. I could look past that if I felt the serum worked for me but it didn't. Perhaps my expectations were too high given that Elemis is a pretty pricey skin care line and other products I have tried fared much better. But this serum was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: My skin just drinks this up. Definitely smooths.
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Elemis products and buy them regularly. I had not used this product before. Applied to clean skin, it is the antidote to winter skin. It feels fantastic and silky on. The container does not have a complete ingredients list but I don’t think there is fragrance added. The scent it does have feels like the result of the woody ingredients. It is very faint. This is a real boost for dry skin; when I use it I just feel the winter tightness fade away. Has a brightening impact. Lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Quickbeam

customer_reviews.title: Makes My Face Feel and Look Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this serum. It’s been a while since I used a serum and I forgot how wonderful a serum can be for my dry skin. Even with moisturizers, my skin still feels dry. This serum makes my skin feel nourished. My skin just looks better when I’m using wearing this. It has even changed the way my makeup looks. I put this on right before applying my makeup and my makeup goes on so smooth and wonderful. I use Retin-A and it can leave my skin a little flaky, this completely alleviates the flakiness.
customer_reviews.author: ⛵⚓Seas the Day⚓⛵

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Super Serum Elixir Anti-wrinkle Serum, 0.5 Fl Oz. It worked really well. My wife loves this face cream. Nice fragrance and not heavy. I'm happy with this. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: AshertopiA

customer_reviews.title: Softens wrinkles so far
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for three weeks and I have noticed softening of my wrinkles. They can be deep harsh lines and this has made them look smoother and less defined. Hopefully over longer use it will soften them even more. It smells like rose. It comes out very liquid and only a tiny bit goes a long way. It does make your skin feel greasy. I like it the most on my neck.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBooks

customer_reviews.title: This does a nice job minimizing lines and wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: This does a nice job minimizing lines and wrinkles. It goes on smoothly. It dispenses a bit too much in one pump because it is thin so be careful to dispense where it won't drip right off your fingers. I gave it 4 stars because it is a bit too oily. Label states to apply moisturizer right after but you really need to give the serum some time to be absorbed--this is not always convenient for me in the morning. (Not so big a problem at night)
customer_reviews.author: ardnam

customer_reviews.title: Keeps My Face Plump!
customer_reviews.text: I don't really have wrinkles but they tell you to start using preventative measures when you're young, but I love the feel of this serum. I do my usual face routine, clean and apply moisturizer with this serum and I have noticed most elasticity in my face. It's more plump so it's working! Let's just hope I don't wrinkles until way later on in life!
customer_reviews.author: Brie Allen

customer_reviews.title: too oily
customer_reviews.text: The serum is way too oily for my taste. It is really runny with oiliness, and it leaves my skin glistening and too greasy looking. It is moisturizing indeed. The smell is OK, but not my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: a customer

customer_reviews.title: Some difference with fine wrinkles, no change with deep wrinkles.
customer_reviews.text: Wife reports that this serum did make her skin feel smoother and softer, but didn't really do anything for her deep wrinkles. However, she does believe there is more elasticity with her very fine wrinkles. The scent is pleasant without smelling like harsh chemicals, which is always a plus when dealing with anti-wrinkle serums.
customer_reviews.author: rockisgeorge

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This serum is a lightweight oil that goes on easily and smoothly. You don't have to use much, which is good because it's expensive. My skin feels softer after using this in the morning and before I go to bed. It has a light, fresh scent.
customer_reviews.author: Divascribe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I've been using Elemis and La Therapie products for over 10 years and this is an amazing product. Will DEFINITELY be using it as part of my beauty regime.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Broke my face out
customer_reviews.text: Felt like baby oil. Very heavy on the skin. Broke my skin out.
customer_reviews.author: Onecutepoohbear

product_meta.title: ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Super Serum Elixir Anti-wrinkle Serum, 0.5 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Clinically proven, this concentrated anti-ageing super serum elixir significantly reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles*. Powered by the unique blend of intelligent bio-actives of Anti-Ageing Tri-Peptides, African Birch Bark and Padina Pavonica, skin feels firmer and is visibly smoothed and plumped.

BRAND STORY
Luxury British skincare & spa brand that delivers pioneering, clinically trialed therapies & products for face & body.
